name: Hawlucha
author: miki kudo
flavor_text: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.

abilities.name: Sudden Cyclone
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Acrobatics
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.
